MS MCQs

    Operate a guide in Dynamics 365 Guides

    »

    1. How do you browse through the steps in a guide?

      With your gaze and your voice

      With gestures

      With a mouse and keyboard


    2. Why do you need to calibrate your HoloLens device?

      To make sure that holograms are correctly aligned.

      To make sure that you can navigate the guide using gaze.

      To be able to work offline as an operator.


    3. Which type of anchor is not attached to a physical object in your real-world environment?

      QR code anchor

      Circular code anchor

      Holographic anchor


    4. Which one of the following features is not available to operators?

      Place new holograms in space

      Hide holograms

      Open a website


    5. Which one of the following statements about working offline is true?

      You can author a guide in Offline mode.

      You don’t need to do anything to set up Offline mode.

      You can select which guides will be available offline when you are in the Guides list.
